title: I Hate Everything About You - Novel Updates
tags: Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   Cute Story   Destiny   Devoted Love Interests   Fated Lovers   Female Protagonist   First Love   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Modern Day   Short Story
author: Ci Hua   瓷话
description:
Chen Sui could not understand,

How could there be someone as obnoxious as Jian Ming Xi in this world?

He had all the things she hated.

She and he were indeed a perfect match…

A pair of opposites.

—A cute story of childhood sweethearts—

Jian Ming Xi X Chen Sui

~You and I were born to be polar opposites~>
